title: Chippenham
name: Revolutions
content: A friendly local restaurant serving a range of dishes using produce from the surrounding area where possible. Typical main courses include sirloin and fillet steak, duck, a fish of the day and pasta of the day. Dishes are served with a selection of seasonal vegetables and potatoes. All evening meals are served as part of a 2 or 3 course deal that includes half a bottle of wine per person
